thread.title_full: Gift For You Free Good News APP for Android and iPhone

title: Gift For You Free Good News APP for Android and iPhone
text:
Gift For You: Free Good News APP for Android and iPhone! 
GoodNewsNetwork Sunday 25th October, 2015 
for Android earlier this month- give you nothing but the good stuff, stories about the environment, health, animals, charities, governments, and kindness do-gooders. 
Users can navigate the fast interface of this completely "native" app wherever they are--even in an airplane or on the subway without cell service, since the articles are automatically cached. 
They can opt for push notifications so the latest good news pops right up, and share the stories on their social media apps with a single tap. Readers can also save their favorite articles so they can come back to read them later. 
I...
